CryptoIntegration.title: Powered by the Stellar Blockchain
CryptoIntegration.subtitle: Moontag leverages the Stellar blockchain for fast, secure, and affordable cryptocurrency transactions. Our platform makes blockchain technology accessible to everyone.

secure_transactions.title: Secure Transactions
secure_transactions.description: Every transaction on Moontag is encrypted and protected by Stellar's distributed ledger technology, ensuring your funds are always safe.

ultra_fast.title: Ultra Fast
ultra_fast.description: The Stellar network confirms transactions in seconds, not minutes or hours, giving you instant access to your purchased gift cards and services.

low_fees.title: Low Transaction Fees
low_fees.description: With transaction fees less than $0.01, Stellar enables Moontag to offer affordable crypto-to-gift-card conversions across Francophone Africa.

multi_currency.title: Multi-Currency Support
multi_currency.description: While built on Stellar, Moontag supports multiple cryptocurrencies, including XLM, BTC, ETH, and various stablecoins, for maximum flexibility.
